attributes.action: Get David Cameron to withdraw his resignation
attributes.background: Clearly David Cameron feels the people of UK don't want him - but many of us, even some that voted out, do want him to remain!  Let's show him how many of us actually value and want him to lead the country whether in or out!!

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
